translation: Aashi kvr yih (qrān) shbi qdri mnz nạzl.
Th tvhụ̄ kya zạniv zi shbi qdr kya chhe?
Shbi qdr chhe sasav rytav khoth zyadh bhtr.

Frshth th rvḥ (jbryl) chih aath andr rb sndi ḥkmh prth kanhh ḥkm hyth vsan. (yath jayih chuh rvḥ murad ḥẓrt jbryl yihndis fẓl v shrf kis bunyads pytth tihnz dhkr chhe frshtav nishhi alg pạtthụ̄ krnh āmcz)
So rat chhe srasr slamty fjr ṭlvʿ spdns tam.
